text: xô na bī xěy! Cng kl̀āw kæ̀ brrdā p̣hriyā k̄hxng cêā læa butr s̄āw k̄hxng cêā læa brrdā h̄ỵing k̄hxng brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā h̄ı̂ phwk nāng dụng s̄eụ̄̂x khlum k̄hxng phwk nāng lng mā pid tạw k̄hxng phwk nāng nạ̀n pĕnkār h̄emāas̄m kẁā thī̀ nāng ca pĕn thī̀ rū̂cạk pheụ̄̀x thī̀ phwk nāng ca mị̀ t̄hūk rbkwn læa xạllxḥˌ thrng pĕn p̄hū̂ xp̣hạy p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
